programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A deadly high-speed chase in Montana leads "Dateline" on a search through 50 years of history to unravel the mystery of how one man turned into a monster and committed one of the state's most notorious crimes.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.sub-title: Even the Devil Went to Church
programme.desc: When a small-town Alabama resident is murdered in his home, rumors involving a local pastor begin to swirl as the truth ends up turning the community upside down.

programme.desc: The investigation into a newlywed's disappearance focuses on her job as a CIA employee as a possible clue.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Twenty-five years after a man involved in a love triangle is stabbed to death, detectives reopen the case.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Michelle Hadley is exonerated after spending three months in jail for attempted forcible rape of her ex-fiance's wife.

programme.desc: The murder of a young businessman in Old San Juan, Puerto Rico, marks the start of a 15-year-long hunt to find the killer.

programme.desc: A woman continues searching for answers after the investigation into her daughter's murder goes cold.
